titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 4567) making appropriations for the Department of Homeland Security for the fiscal year ending September 30, 2005, and for other purposes.

action.text: Rule provides for consideration of H.R. 4567 with 1 hour of general debate. Previous question shall be considered as ordered without intervening motions except motion to recommit with or without instructions. Measure will be considered read. Bill is open to amendments.
The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 108-545, by Mr. Diaz-Balart, L..

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 187.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 675.
On ordering the previous question Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 224 - 205 (Roll no. 243).

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by recorded vote: 234 - 197 (Roll no. 244).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 6/16/2004--Passed House without amendment. Sets forth the rule for consideration of the bill (H.R. 4567) making appropriations for the Department of Homeland Security for the fiscal year ending September 30, 2005.
